english.segment1: Why this happened I cannot explain. Why write the script with such heartache and pain. Could there not have been an easier way
english.segment2: Watching life through this glass so faded. I cannot see the bigger picture taking place. Oh to understand one day
english.segment3: Chorus. My heart will fly. When I finally see you face to face. And my tears will fly. Away, away
english.segment4: It wont be long until we all go home. With all things revealed and on that day well finally know. Oh, as we are fully known
english.segment6: Bridge. And what appears as incomplete. Is still completely Yours. And one day well see as weve been seen. And well soar
